name: Telephone and Data Systems, Inc.
description: Telephone and Data Systems, Inc. (TDS) is a diversified telecommunications company that provides a wide range of communication services to residential and business customers. Founded in 1968, TDS operates through its subsidiaries, including U.S. Cellular, which is one of the largest wireless carriers in the United States. The company is committed to delivering high-quality voice, data, and Internet services while ensuring customer satisfaction and innovation. TDS focuses on expanding its network infrastructure, investing in advanced technologies such as 5G and fiber-optic systems, to enhance connectivity in underserved areas. With a mission to connect people and businesses, TDS is dedicated to bridging the digital divide and contributing to the communities it serves. The company offers various services including wireless plans, high-speed Internet, and managed network services, catering to the diverse needs of its customers. TDS remains forward-thinking, adapting to the ever-evolving telecommunications landscape while emphasizing reliability and customer service.

seo.meta_title: Telephone and Data Systems, Inc. | Telecommunications and Wireless Services
seo.meta_description: Learn about Telephone and Data Systems, Inc. (TDS), a leading telecommunications provider committed to quality services and connecting communities.

faq.question: What services does TDS provide?
faq.answer: TDS provides wireless services through U.S. Cellular, high-speed Internet, and managed network services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of TDS?
faq.answer: Leigh W. Fox is the CEO of Telephone and Data Systems, Inc.

faq.question: Where is TDS headquartered?
faq.answer: TDS is headquartered in Chicago, Illinois, USA.
